CREDITS

Jam Build Notes

This was made for the GMTK Game Jam. There's still more work we'd like to do for it but we won't be allowed to make edits during the judgement period.

We were right up to the deadline with this game. I'm (NotExplosive) used to 72 hour jams where I have a bit more time. I tend to polish-as-I-go which usually pays good dividends, but in this case it meant that the actual content of our game (the levels) were postponed until the last possible minute.
